attributes.action: Freeze TfL fares until they provide seamless service (no delays).
attributes.additional_details:
New trains are being added to the London underground in 2024. A long way away from the un-freezing of fares.

References:
https://tfl.gov.uk/campaign/fares-freeze
https://tfl.gov.uk/campaign/tube-improvements/what-we-are-doing/improving-the-trains
attributes.background:
The Mayor of London has frozen TfL fares until 2020. Commuters are already paying extortionate amounts for a service that doesn't work and is consistently late. 
If TfL ever do consider increasing their fares again, they should be providing oustanding service, with no delays or "signal failures".

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the Mayor of London and Transport for London, accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions system. You can find out more here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
